trans-unit.source: Represents an object that is used to define the layout of a row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: 表示定义列标题的行布局所用的对象。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> object and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> objects are support objects for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> mode that displays data in columns for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>对象和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>对象是用于支持对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>的列中显示数据的模式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view, see the [GridView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>查看，请参阅[GridView 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can determine when a column is moving to a new location by monitoring the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定当列移动到新位置通过监视<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>为定义的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can customize column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether columns can change positions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否可更改位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if columns can be moved by the drag-and-drop operation of a column header; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可通过拖放列标题的操作来移动列，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.

When you implement this class as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> dependency property.
The area that is available for the column header row.
trans-unit.target: 可用于列标题行的区域。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the header row elements, and computes the actual size of the header row.
trans-unit.target: 排列标题行元素的内容，并计算标题行的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> for the column header row.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> to use for the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于列标题的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> to use for the column header container.
trans-unit.target: 用于列标题容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.

When you implement this class as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: You can customize column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, some restrictions apply.
trans-unit.target: 当你设置样式时，则某些限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Property Element Usage
XAML Values
*ResourceExtension*
One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
*StyleResourceKey*
The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: 标识所请求的样式的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但不是建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用，或也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu" /> for the column headers.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu" /> for the column header row.
The default is <see langword="null" />.

When you implement this class as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: You can customize column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderContextMenu" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置，则将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。

trans-unit.source: If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了多个属性，使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式化列标题。

trans-unit.source: The format for a column can be set on several types.
trans-unit.target: 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority:
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示可用于格式化列标题，按从低到高优先级的顺序排列的属性：

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to **true**
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderStringFormat" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the template to use to display the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示列标题的模板。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that is used to display the column header content.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示列标题内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.

When you implement this class as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>优先。

trans-unit.source: You can customize column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Property Element Usage
XAML Values
*ResourceExtension*
One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
*TemplateResourceKey*
The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: 标识所请求的模板的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但不是建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用，或也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate" /> dependency property.
The identifier for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> that provides logic that selects the data template to use to display a column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提供逻辑来选择用于显示列标题的数据模板的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> that chooses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> to use to display each column header.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" />，选择用于显示每个列标题的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>优先。

trans-unit.source: When you implement this class as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: You can customize column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Property Element Usage
XAML Values
*MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*
A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 从派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>实现实用的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension*
One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
*DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*
The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 键指实现实用的派生类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加的实例你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>作为资源的资源字典的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the content for a tooltip for the column header row.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列标题行的工具提示内容。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the content of a tooltip for the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示列标题的工具提示内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you implement this class as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: You can customize column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的列标题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Property Element Usage
XAML Values
A string that becomes the display text for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>.
An object to use as the content for the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 要用作工具提示的内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that defines a layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, such as a text element.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，此对象是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或定义的布局的其他某个元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>，例如文本元素。

trans-unit.source: In this usage, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种用法，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>元素是隐式创建从已分析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，和`toolTipObjectContent`内容设置为其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: <`ToolTip` .../>
See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> dependency property.
The amount of area that is available to display the column header row.
trans-unit.target: 可用于显示列标题行的区域大小。

trans-unit.source: Determines the area that is required to display the column header row.
trans-unit.target: 确定显示列标题行所需的区域。

trans-unit.source: The required <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> for the column header row.
Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> object for the column header row.
trans-unit.target: 创建列标题行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewHeaderRowPresenterAutomationPeer" /> object for this column header row.
trans-unit.target: 此列标题行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewHeaderRowPresenterAutomationPeer" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 事件的类处理。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event occurs while a column is moving to a new position, the move is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>事件发生时列移动到新位置，则会取消移动。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event that occurs when the user presses the left mouse button inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于当用户在 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> 内按下鼠标左键时发生的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 事件的类处理。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> is `true`, this method prepares a column to be dragged to another location in the column header row.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>是`true`，此方法准备要拖动到列标题行中的其他位置的列。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件通过设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件自变量`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event that occurs when the user releases the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于当用户释放鼠标左键时发生的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> 事件的类处理。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> is `true`, and if the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event occurs after a column is dragged to a new location, the column is moved.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>是`true`，并且如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件发生在将列拖到新位置之后，移动列。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件通过设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件自变量`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于当用户移动鼠标时发生的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> 事件的类处理。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> property is set to `true` and the user presses the left mouse button, this method implements the visual behavior that occurs when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>属性设置为`true`并且用户按下鼠标左键，此方法实现用户拖动时发生的可视行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>到新位置。

trans-unit.source: This method override sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event even if the user does not press the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写集<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件自变量`true`为<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>即使用户没有按下鼠标左键的事件。
